text: We came here for a corporate team-building session and had a blast! The VR games were super fun and a great way to bond with colleagues. Perfect for small groups—just 2 to 6 people per session. Highly recommend for a unique and exciting team activity!

VR game was intense and mad fun. So many things to shoot at and so many zombies pouncing on you
The kids love it. The staffers were also very nice to guide the kids along and very helpful. Thumbs up to Adib!

The experience is awesome!!! Hubby and our kid really enjoyed the Squid Games VR. They also debrief our team and started on time. Also got discount if you are a returning customer!  Sandbox, super goooood!

Nice team work game.

Need to sign in before the game start.

The staff will explain the procedure and things to wear.

For those wear glass, depend on the glass size whether can squeeze in the VR helmet.
Brought my 6 year old for the davy jones. He loved it and we completed the game within the allocated slot. So this place works for the youngest ones as well :)
